ApproxsimClient.map.adapter
Class MapDrawableAdapter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.map.adapter.MapDrawableAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApproxsimObjectAdapter, ApproxsimEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
MapElementAdapter, MapLineAdapter, MapPointAdapter, MapShapeAdapter
public abstract class MapDrawableAdapter
extends Object
implements ApproxsimEventListener, ApproxsimObjectAdapter

The adapter which adapts all ApproxsimObjects that can be drawn on the map.
